relaxedEntityHeadMatch(Mention, Mention) - Method in class elkfed.coref.algorithms.sieve.SieveUtilities
 
RelaxedHeadMatchSieve - Class in elkfed.coref.algorithms.sieve
 
RelaxedHeadMatchSieve(List<Mention>) - Constructor for class elkfed.coref.algorithms.sieve.RelaxedHeadMatchSieve
 
RelaxedStringMatchSieve - Class in elkfed.coref.algorithms.sieve
This sieve considers two nominal mentions as coreferent, if the strings obtained by dropping the text following their head words (such as relative clauses and PP and participial postmodifiers) are identical (e.g., [Clinton] and [Clinton, whose term ends in January]).
RelaxedStringMatchSieve(List<Mention>) - Constructor for class elkfed.coref.algorithms.sieve.RelaxedStringMatchSieve
